title: The Hawaiian story of the wind keepers - Sydney Iaukea

multiple-choice.question: What was the primary reason Paka'a was stripped of his land and privileges?

options.label: A
options.text: He was deemed incompetent by the king.

options.label: B
options.text: He was envious of the king's navigators.

options.label: C
options.text: He was betrayed by the king's seafaring navigators who were envious of his position.

options.label: D
options.text: He failed to teach his son the way of the winds.

multiple-choice.question: What was the task that Paka'a's ancestral spirits prevented the king from completing?

options.label: A
options.text: Building a new canoe.

options.label: B
options.text: Shooting the birds that rotted the trees.

options.label: C
options.text: Divining Paka'a's location.

options.label: D
options.text: Constructing canoes for a journey.

multiple-choice.question: What was the reason Kuapaka'a maintained the storm for four months?

options.label: A
options.text: To test the king's loyalty and dedication.

options.label: B
options.text: To prove his own worth to the king.

options.label: C
options.text: To keep the king's navigators from finding Paka'a.

options.label: D
options.text: To earn the king's trust.

options.text: Kuapaka'a lost, and the fishermen won the wager.

options.label: B

options.label: C
options.text: Kuapaka'a won, and the fishermen were forced to admit defeat.

multiple-choice.question: What was the condition that the king agreed to in order to welcome Paka'a home?

options.label: A
options.text: He would give up his throne.

options.label: B
options.text: He would exile Paka'a's son, Kuapaka'a.

options.label: C
options.text: He would restore Paka'a's lands and position, and execute the two treacherous navigators.

options.label: D

options.label: A
options.text: They thought he was trying to trick them.

options.label: B
options.text: They were skeptical of his abilities.

options.label: C

options.label: A
options.text: To overthrow the king and take his throne.

options.text: She provided him with a magical paddle.

options.label: B
